places.review: Good place, good ambience, good service as well.
Nice place, good atmosphere, good music, good service.
Fast service, clean place, WiFi available
The place is nice, clean and cozy. Then the beverages is also good. However, the internet is a bit weak. This place can be your choice to chill out or to do your tasks.
Cheap and suitable for doing the homework or just have a chit chat with your friends. The panekoek is so delicious!
